memberdef.name: MSG_NAK_SUMMARY
memberdef.initializer: 0 /* Summary of file gaps in every Nak */

memberdef.name: MSG_NAK_DETAILS
memberdef.initializer: 0 /* Details of file gaps in every Nak */

memberdef.name: MSG_STATE_ALL
memberdef.initializer: 0 /* One message per transaction in every cycle */

memberdef.name: MSG_STATE_CHANGE
memberdef.initializer: 0 /* Message is only output when state changes */

memberdef.name: ASSERT__
memberdef.initializer: { \ if (!(s)) \ { \ msg__ ("Assertion failed in %s at line %u.\n", __func__, __LINE__); \ if (IS_ASSERT_ALLOWED_TO_EXIT) \ abort (); \ } \ }

memberdef.name: ASSERT__BUG_DETECTED
memberdef.initializer: { \ msg__ ("Bug detected in %s at line %u.\n", __func__, __LINE__); \ if (IS_ASSERT_ALLOWED_TO_EXIT) \ abort (); \ } \
